name: Nanika
description:
Nanika is a simple slow sandbox multiplayer experimental game, every time the timer reaches zero you can perform an action.
Every resource you take or place is bound to a global inventory that every player can access.
Bring some friends or join our Discord server to make new ones. dwarfs strong together.

Controls:

•Move the camera with WASD •Pick up a block with Right mouse click
•Place a block with Left mouse click
•Choose blocks to place with mouse wheel

to explore the map by removing a block adjacent to the fog of war

Game created by
Simsure
Wasly
